game.name: Masked Forces Zombie Survival
game.description:
The second sequel of the most popular 3D FPS multiplayer shooter Masked Forces has just come out! We are damn sure that you will find yourself surrounded by the more thrilling and entertaining environment this time. The entire city has just been captured by a horde of deadly zombies. They look in a more aggressive mood than ever before, feeding upon their preys, crawling in the shadows, and, of course, wanting more blood. The scent of a soldier can make these blood-thirsty souls angrier. Luckily, you carry your gun loaded with ammo. Join Masked Forces: Zombie Survival and get ready to eliminate all of them from the city!

All you need to do is just grab your AK and begin shooting all these dangerous monsters down in this brand new action game. Try to put your precision and shooting skills to test to level up your account and purchase more advanced armors and weapons! This multiplayer battle game allows you to fight against players from all across the world. You will get here all the things, including shooting action, entertainment and money.?

Shoot down your enemies, and grab bounties for their heads in this html5 fighting game! There are two maps to explore in three different challenging battle modes: doomsday, teams and free for all.? You are a brave soldier of Special Forces. You know how to use your skill to survive zombie apocalypse and destroy all rival players. Work in a team to wipe all the waves of zombies in this one of the top free zombie games! Good luck to check out more zombie survival games for free!
